block.p: Malyn A. Vallarta, a daughter of Ludita and Carlos Vallarta Jr. of Washington and New York, was married yesterday to Michael Charles Sheridan, a son of Doris Sheridan of Nyack, N.Y., and the late Charles Sheridan. The Rev. Steven Fogel, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Yale Club of New York City.

Mrs. Vallarta Sheridan is an associate general counsel in New York for Barclays Capital, a brokerage subsidiary of Barclays Bank. She graduated from Vassar College and received a law degree from George Washington University. Her father is the chief of payroll operations at the United Nations in New York. Her mother is the director of communications and information services at the Industrial Research Institute, a trade organization in Washington for industrial engineering companies.

Malyn A. Vallarta, a daughter of Ludita and Carlos Vallarta Jr. of Washington and New York, was married yesterday to Michael Charles Sheridan, a son of Doris Sheridan of Nyack, N.Y., and the late Charles Sheridan. The Rev. Steven Fogel, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Yale Club of New York City.

Mrs. Vallarta Sheridan is an associate general counsel in New York for Barclays Capital, a brokerage subsidiary of Barclays Bank. She graduated from Vassar College and received a law degree from George Washington University. Her father is the chief of payroll operations at the United Nations in New York. Her mother is the director of communications and information services at the Industrial Research Institute, a trade organization in Washington for industrial engineering companies.

Mr. Sheridan is a portfolio manager at MacKay Shields, an investment management subsidiary of the New York Life Insurance Company in New York. He graduated from Union College in Schenectady, N.Y. His mother retired as an executive secretary for the Nyack public schools. His father was a quality-assurance engineer for the United States Testing Company, an independent laboratory in Hoboken, N.J.
